title: MISO
tip: Add miso at the end of cooking to keep its flavor alive.

title: TOFU
tip: Soak your tofu before frying – thank us later.

title: GINGER
tip: Grate ginger frozen – no mess, just magic.

title: GARLIC
tip: Microwave garlic for 10 seconds and the skin slips right off.

title: RICE
tip: Rinse your rice until the water runs clear for fluffier results.

title: SESAME OIL
tip: Drizzle sesame oil after cooking to keep the aroma intact.

title: ONIONS
tip: Soak sliced onions in cold water to mellow their sharpness.

title: CHILI
tip: Toast dried chilis for deeper flavor before grinding.

title: CITRUS ZEST
tip: Zest before you juice – way easier and more flavorful!
